page.title: 14FARMING
page.content: Most of the farmland at Three Lane Ends is used for cereals and breeding animals like pigs and cows.The cereals are barley,wheat and oats.Some of the land is used as rough grazing or for growing fodder for animals. The farm near to this area is known as Jagger's Farm.It has 400 acres of land.The type of farming is arable and mixed farming.He keeps cows for milk and beef,bulls for breeding,and also sheep.He keeps turkeys to fatten for Christmas.He grows crops such as potatoes,wheat and barley on rotation. He employs 5 workers on his farm.He has one other farm,but his family have had this one for 70 years.The farming equipment he uses consists of tractors and combine harvesters.
